## Quarto-live

Embed WebAssembly powered code blocks and exercises for both the R and Python languages into [Quarto](https://quarto.org/) documents with HTML-based output formats. To learn more about Quarto see <https://r-wasm.github.io/quarto-live/>.

```{webr}
for (x in 1:5) {
  print(x ** 2)
}
```

```{pyodide}
for x in range(1, 6):
  print(10 + x)
```
